snippet: Google said the program, which allowed independent bookstores to sell e-books through their Web sites, was not a success. Bookstores said it was a valuable platform that allowed them to give customers something they wanted.
abstract: Google said the program, which allowed independent bookstores to sell e-books through their Web sites, was not a success. Bookstores said it was a valuable platform that allowed them to give customers something they wanted.

headline.main: In a Blow to Independent Bookstores, Google to Discontinue Reseller Program
headline.print_headline: Google to End E-Book Sales Program Used by Shops
